movies.title: Core
movies.plot: Core goes to the heart of climbing. Join an international cast of the sport's most dedicated athletes as they stick it when it matters most. Shot in 35mm Ultra HD, get ready to see every detail of some of the nastiest pieces of rock ever climbed.
